title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 680.2 - Mental health professionals certification committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 680.2 - Mental health professionals certification committee

State Regulations
(a) A mental health
professionals certification committee shall be established for the First and

Second Judicial Departments. (b) The committee shall be composed of
no fewer than two justices of the Supreme Court, two judges of the Family

Court, two lawyers, two social workers, two psychologists, and two
psychiatrists. Half of the members in each class shall be appointed by the

Presiding Justices of the First and Second Departments of the Appellate

Division, respectively, for three-year terms. Committee members shall be
eligible for reappointment for additional terms. The Law Guardian Directors for
the Appellate Division in the First and Second Judicial Departments, respectively, or their designees, shall be ex-officio members. (c) The members of the
committee shall serve as volunteers, authorized to participate in a

State-sponsored volunteer program within the meaning of the Public Officers

Law, ยง17. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
680.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
